{
        "test_id": "table_004_auto_layout",
        "category": "basic",
        "features": ["table-layout-auto", "content-based-width", "automatic-sizing"],
        "description": "Table with automatic layout algorithm where column widths adjust to content",
        "spec_references": ["https://www.w3.org/TR/CSS2/tables.html#auto-table-layout"],
        "complexity": "basic"
